        Specified by:
        render in class de.hadizadeh.positioning.roommodel.Map
        Parameters:
        mapCanvas - canvas
        startRow - Starting row for rendering
        startColumn - Starting column for rendering
        visibleRows - Amount of rows to render
        visibleColumns - Amount of columns to render

        currentYLb - label for y values (can be null if not needed)
        currentMaterialLb - label for material value (can be null if not needed)
        currentContentLb - label for content value (can be null if not needed)
        context - activity context
